div.div: Monmouth College vs. Lake Forest College
at Lake Forest, Ill. | Farwell Field

tr.td: MC wins toss and defers. LFC will defend west end zone.
Joey Biel kickoff 60 yards to the LFC05, Alex Pasiewicz return 15 yards to the LFC20 (Kyle Schultz).
Lake Forest College drive start at 15:00.
Jagan Cleary pass incomplete to Charlie Quinn (D.J. Frank).
Jagan Cleary pass complete to Charlie Quinn for 1 yard to the LFC21 (D.J. Frank).
Jagan Cleary pass complete to Willie McIntyre for 23 yards to the LFC44 (Ryne Daum).
Joey Valdivia rush for 3 yards to the LFC47 (Matt Barnes).
Jagan Cleary pass complete to Max Sorby for no gain to the LFC47 (Tre Maxwell; D.J. Frank).
PENALTY LFC false start 5 yards to the LFC42.
Jagan Cleary pass incomplete to Alex Pasiewicz.
C. Courtney punt 25 yards to the MC33, downed.
DeAndre Wright rush for 13 yards to the MC46 (John Laponte).
DeAndre Wright rush for 3 yards to the MC49 (Tim Finucane).
DeAndre Wright rush for 11 yards to the LFC40 (Tim Finucane).
DeAndre Wright rush for loss of 1 yard to the LFC41 (J. McInerney).
DeAndre Wright rush for 10 yards to the LFC31, out-of-bounds (R.J. Pompey).

Tanner Matlick pass incomplete to Yansay Williams.

Joey Valdivia rush for 3 yards to the LFC20 (Lamar Watson).
